subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The reserves Darren Collison and Jamal Crawford each scored 15 points, and the Los Angeles Clippers used a strong second half to beat the host Memphis Grizzlies, 101-81.
snippet: The reserves Darren Collison and Jamal Crawford each scored 15 points, and the Los Angeles Clippers used a strong second half to beat the host Memphis Grizzlies, 101-81.
